name: Super Block Hot Sniper 2 - Pocket Pixel Vs Voxel Shooting Games Build It Mini Lab Edition
name_original: Super Block Hot Sniper 2 - Pocket Pixel Vs Voxel Shooting Games Build It Mini Lab Edition
description:
!! BULLET TIME IN A NEXT LEVEL !!
Craft your OWN weapons, choose your its own BULLETS!
Build barricades and shelters! Challenge your enemies

The saga continues!

Super Hot 2! Pocket Mini Lab Edition is a block shooter where you take control of the time. Unless you move the action takes place in super slow motion. You can actually watch projectiles in air but once you start walking time goes by faster. With these capabilities you can avoid bullets shooting at you.

FEATURES:
- Six different huge stages! Every stage has its own atmosphere!
- Craft your own weapons!
- Massive Boss fight!
- Immersive gameplay
- Very unique weapon system, variable bullets with own characteristics !!!!

MORE TO COME:
- Multiplayer world wide and local
- new stages!!

Fan made version!

Change log:

1.0 - initial release
1.1 - more blocks, more performance
